title: Foundations of Instructional Design for [Massive] Online Geography Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Geography Concepts and Basic Knowledge of Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Non-degree course for pre-service/in-service teachers conducted in BYOD environments, emphasizing real-time interaction and practice-centered learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain effective instructional design principles for online geography classes
Learners can design at least two types of interactive activities in Zoom-based real-time classes
Learners can create instructional materials linking geography content with digital tools (Google Earth, Padlet, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
